unit.utterance: Dāstān az ānjā šoru mišavad ke yek bāqbāni dārad az yek deraxte golābi dārad golābi mičinad'
unit.utterance_translation: a gardner is picking pears from a tree

unit.utterance: bad yek meqdār ke golābi mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: after picking pears for quite some time

unit.utterance: az ān sabadi ke ruye šekamaš ast mixāhad biyāyad pāyin inhā rā xāli konad tuye sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: he wants to come down to put the pears into the basket

unit.utterance: yeki az golābiha hamān moqe mioftad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: suddenly one of the pears falls down

unit.utterance: dar eyne hāl ke bāqbān dārad golābihā rā xāli mikonad tuye yeki az ān sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: while the man is emptying the pears into a basket

unit.utterance: yek āqāyi ham na un baadaš hast bāqbān golābihā rā xāli mikonad tuye sabad
va etefāqan ān golābi ke ruye zamin oftāde bud ham belaxare barmidārad pāk mikonad migozārad tyue ān sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: he also took the pear which was on the ground, he cleans it and put it into a basket

unit.utterance: bāqbān dobāre miravad bālāye deraxt hamān moqe yek āqāyi ham miāyad az kenāraš bā yek bozi rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner climbs up the tree, at the same time a man came with a goat and crossed over the gardner

unit.utterance: ke dar in moqe hič tavajohi rā be xodaš jalb nemikonad bāqbān ham dārad be kāre xodaš edāme midahad
unit.utterance_translation: nobody noticed him and so is the gardner

unit.utterance: hamčenān ke bāqbān dārad dobāre golābi mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: while the gardner is picking the pears

unit.utterance: yek bāčeyi bā dočarxe dārad az hamānjā az baqale deraxte golābi rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: a kid on a bike crosses over the pear tree

unit.utterance: va čašmaš mioftad be golābihā
unit.utterance_translation: he sees the pears

unit.utterance: hamān moqe pesare az dočarxeaš piyāde mišavad va say mikonad yeki az ān golābihā rā bardārad va dar nahāyat yek sabad golābi rā barmidārad migozārad ruye dočarxeaš
unit.utterance_translation: he stops and decides to take a pear but he ended up taking the whole basket, and puts it on his bike

unit.utterance: va bedune inke bāqbān čizi befahmad pesare bā sabade golābi rad mišavad miravad
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner doesn't notice and the kid goes away

unit.utterance: Tuye rāhi ke pesar dārad bā dočarxeaš miravad
unit.utterance_translation: on his way

unit.utterance: yek pesarbače etefāqan dārad az hamān rāh barakse masire pesar rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: another kid is coming from the opposite direction

unit.utterance: ke mixorad be pesare kolāhe pesare aval mioftad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: the two kids collide on the way, and the boy's hat falls down

unit.utterance: baadaš ham pesare tā barmigardad be aqab negāh bokonad dočarxeaš mixorad be yek sangi
unit.utterance_translation: he looks back and his bike hits a stone

unit.utterance: va dočarxeaš vājgun mišavad va hameye golābiha ba sabade mirizad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: the bike falls down and all the pears spill out

unit.utterance: hamān moqe se tā bače dārand hamānjā bāzi mikardand
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time three boys are playing there

unit.utterance: pesarbačehā tā in pesar rā mibinand miāyand beheš komak mikonand
unit.utterance_translation: as they see the scene, they come to help the boy

unit.utterance: jam mikonand golābiha rā dobāre mirizand tuye sabade sabad rā barmidārand migozārand ruye dočarxe
unit.utterance_translation: they gather the pears and put them back into the basket, and put the basket on the bike

unit.utterance: bad pesare be rāhe xodaš edāme midahad
unit.utterance_translation: and the boy continues his own way

unit.utterance: yek zarre ke pesarbačehā miravand jolotar mibinand ke kolāhe bačehe oftāde ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: as they go further, they find the boy's hat on the ground

unit.utterance: yeki az ān bačehā bā sut pesar rā sedā mikonad barmigardānad kolāhaš rā beheš midahad, pesarbače ham dar avaz čandtā golābi midahad be inhā
unit.utterance_translation: one of them whistels, he looked back, they give him back his hat, and in return he gives them a few pears

unit.utterance: ke fekr mikonam se tā golābi ast
unit.utterance_translation: three pears actually

unit.utterance: pesarbačehā golābihā rā migirand tuye dastešān mixorand
unit.utterance_translation: the boys take the pears and start eating them

unit.utterance: uye ān rāhe bargaštešān miresand be ānjāyi ke bāqbān dārad az deraxte golābi miāyad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: on their way back they cross the man who is picking pears

unit.utterance: hamān moqe bāqbān negāh mikonad mibinad yeki az sabadhā nist
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner looks down and finds out one of the basket is not there

unit.utterance: hamān lahze ham pesarbačehā az kenāraš rad mišavand hamčenān ke dārad negāh mikonad ke yeki az sabadhā nist mibinad ke pesarbačehā az kenaraš rad mišavand va yeki az bačehā fekr konam golābi dar dastaš ast
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time he sees the boys crossing over while one of the boys has a pear in his hand

unit.utterance: va injā dāstān be pāyān miresad
unit.utterance_translation: and that's how the story ends
